title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 November 2015 - XWiki
content:
<iamchrisf> has quit  
01:14 <abusenius> has quit  
01:39 <Enygma`> has quit  
02:09 <vmassol> has quit  
02:09 <vmassol\_> is now known as <vmassol>  
03:59 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
05:55 <vmassol1> has quit  
05:56 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
06:17 <cjd> has quit  
06:18 <cjd\_> has joined #xwiki  
06:56 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
07:26 <cjd\_> is now known as <cjd>  
07:44 <cjd> has quit  
07:57 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
08:34 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:44 <woshilapin> has quit  
08:52 <Ramona1> has quit  
09:10 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:14 <ekarlso> any of you guys up ? : )  
09:14 <ekarlso> http://pastebin.com/J30Kb0jb  
09:23 <tmortagne> ekarlso: looks like a bug in mariadb connector or a very edge case on XWiki side that I never seen, if you have a way to reproduce it would be great to detail it on http://jira.xwiki.org. Hard to tell what is wrong just from the stack trace, need to debug it.  
09:27 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:35 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:49 <flashdel> has quit  
09:53 <ekarlso> tmortagne: I saw there was some errors during the initialization as well or the wizard rather just after installing  
09:53 <ekarlso> tmortagne: easy way, install xwiki on a host, use mariadb 10.1 and the mariadb 1.2.3 connector instead of the mysql one  
09:58 <tmortagne> ekarlso: I won't have time to debug this myself right now, better if you detail everything on jira so that we don't forget  
09:59 <ekarlso> :(  
09:59 <ekarlso> my wiki is broken then  
10:02 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
10:04 <ekarlso> tmortagne: I can't even create a page atm...  
10:06 <flashdel> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:10 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:56 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:57 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
14:09 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
14:17 <tmortagne> has quit  
14:17 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
14:44 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
16:08 <Trefex> has quit  
16:15 <mflorea> gdelhumeau: I hope your change to the menu is not dangerous, I need to release 7.3RC1 asap (maybe tomorrow). Can you finish XWIKI-12772 today? (afaik you are not available tomorrow)  
16:15 <gdelhumeau> i finish it today  
16:15 <mflorea> great, thanks  
16:15 <mflorea> there is also XWIKI-12298, do you plan to fix it for 7.3RC1?  
16:16 <gdelhumeau> no  
16:16 <mflorea> ok, then I'll move it  
16:31 <tmortagne> mflorea: I'm writing tests for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12771  
16:35 <msmeria> has quit  
16:57 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
17:25 <OSIMasson> has quit  
17:47 <tmortagne> has left #xwiki  
17:47 <vmassol1> good morning  
17:51 <ClemensR> has quit  
17:52 <woshilapin\_irccl> has quit  
18:05 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
18:07 <benoitc> has quit  
18:08 <woshilapin\_irccl> has joined #xwiki  
18:11 <cjd> irccloud proprietary junk  
18:11 <benoitc> has joined #xwiki  
18:12 <cjd> kiwiirc is better :)  
18:17 <vmassol1> does kiwiirc have persistent logging?  
18:18 <cjd> no, it's just a web UI  
18:19 <cjd> but it would be really cool to integrate with it a thing which asks a bot in the channel for the logs, the bot gives a HTTP link to the logs and then it just displays them in the channel just like they were part of the conversation  
18:19 <cjd> and not very difficult to implement but high value :)  
18:26 <mflorea> gdelhumeau: are you fixing http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/2103/#showFailuresLink ?  
18:26 <gdelhumeau> yes  
18:26 <mflorea> ok, thanks  
18:36 <vmassol1> mflorea: see my question above too if you have 2 minutes :)  
18:36 <mflorea> the plan is to close the remaining issues asap http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=Project%20in%20%28%22XWiki%20Commons%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Rendering%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Platform%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Enterprise%22%29%20and%20fixVersion%20in%20%28%227.3-rc-1%22%29%20and%20resolution%20in%20%28%22Unresolved%22%29

19:29 <vmassol1> we need to be careful not to go over the christams season for 7.4
